name: Crippling Curse
description: When an opponent's monster attacks, reduce its ATK by 500 points.

name: Shattered Guard
description: When an opponent's monster attacks, reduce its DEF by 500 points.

name: Phantom Dodge
description: Negate the first attack on your monsters this turn.

name: Mirror Strike
description: Reflect an enemy's attacking monster: the attacker is destroyed instead.

name: Weaken Summon
description: When an opponent summons a monster, it loses 500 ATK and DEF.
